author: Michael McIlroy
description: This rum-based Negroni may make you wonder why you've been drinking gin Negronis all these years.
name: The Right Hand
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
